answers.answer: The primary ways to enter Romania are by obtaining temporary protection, with a short-stay right, or as an asylum seeker.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the section under 'My rights'.

answers.answer: An individual's rights in Romania depend on their specific status.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the section under 'My rights'.

answers.answer: Temporary protection is a special form of protection for people fleeing the war in Ukraine.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the section under 'Temporary protection'.

answers.answer: Ukrainian nationals entering with a short-stay right can stay up to 90 days in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the section under 'Short stay'.

answers.answer: An individual is considered an asylum seeker in Romania from the moment they ask for asylum, either in writing or verbally.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the section under 'Applying for asylum'.

answers.answer: One applies for asylum in Romania by asking for it, either in writing or verbally.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the section under 'Applying for asylum'.

answers.answer: Someone should apply for asylum at the Romanian border if they cannot present any documents upon entering Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the section under 'My rights'.

answers.answer: Individuals can find support information for entering other European countries by consulting the hotlines and websites listed for Poland, Moldova, Hungary, and The Slovak Republic.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Temporary protection is a special form of protection for people fleeing the war in Ukraine, and if one is a beneficiary, their permit is automatically valid until 03/04/2026 without needing an extension.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the section under 'Temporary protection'.

answers.answer: Ukrainian nationals need to present a valid passport at the border crossing for a short stay entry into Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the section under 'Short stay'.

answers.answer: The provided content states that one can apply for asylum within Romania at a later point, but does not specify the reasons why someone might choose to do so.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/legal-status and read the page carefully.
